DOC.brief_summary: Multi-centre study evaluate NobelActive 3.0 mm implant immediately restore single crown maxillary lateral incisor area mandibular central lateral incisor area .
DOC.brief_title: A 5 Year Clinical Study NobelActive 3 mm Implants
DOC.criteria: Obtained informed consent subject . The subject shall least 18 year age pass secession growth . The subject shall need one single tooth implant support restoration ( ) maxillary lateral incisor mandibular central lateral incisor area mouth . The subject shall natural tooth roots present side adjacent implant position . The subject must physical mental condition 5year followup period carry without foreseeable problem . The subject shall sufficient bone volume implant site place NobelActive 3.0 mm implant length least 10 mm . The subject well implant site shall fulfill criterion immediate provisionalization within 24 hour . A minimum insertion torque 35 Ncm without rotation require . The implant site shall free tooth remnant . If implant place extraction site , extraction socket least 3 intact wall . A dehiscence defect 3 mm permit fourth wall . If implant place extraction site , proper thorough debridement extraction socket perform . The subject shall healthy compliant good oral hygiene . The subject shall favorable stable occlusal relationship . The subject able give her/his inform consent participate Health condition , permit surgical treatment . Reason believe treatment might negative effect subject 's total situation ( psychiatric problem ) , note subject record subject history . Any disorder plan implant area previous tumour , chronic bone disease previous irradiation . Teeth position adjacent implant site ongoing infection , endodontic periodontal problem . Alcohol drug abuse note subject record subject history . Heavy smoking ( > 10 cigarettes/day ) . Uncontrolled diabetes , i.e . subject diagnose diabetes history neglect doctor 's recommendation regard treatment , food alcohol intake . Any disease medication might influence involved tissue , intake bisphosphonates , treatment heparine , osteogenesis imperfecta , osteoporosis etc . Severe bruxism destructive habit . If implant able withstand final torque 35 Ncm without rotation , implant reason immediately provisionalized , judged clinician , implant exclude study .
